com.qmetry.qaf.automation.ws.rest

Annotation Type Request


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Request
    Use this annotation to override default parameters at class or test level. If Scheduler xml file is provided it will use this parameters for filter.
    Author:
    chirag

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String resourceName 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String data 
      java.lang.String method
      One of the HTTP methods HttpMethod.GET HttpMethod.POST HttpMethod.PUT HttpMethod.DELETE Default value is HttpMethod.GET
      java.lang.String parameters
      JSON multi-value map for exampl: "{'param1':['valuep1'];'param2':['valueparam2','value2param2']}",
      java.lang.String serviceEndPoint 
      java.lang.String type
      Constants are available with MediaType class.

    • Element Detail

      • resourceName

        public abstract java.lang.String resourceName
        Returns:

      • serviceEndPoint

        public abstract java.lang.String serviceEndPoint
        Returns:
        Default:

        Returns:

      • method

        public abstract java.lang.String method
          One of the HTTP methods
        • HttpMethod.GET
        • HttpMethod.POST
        • HttpMethod.PUT
        • HttpMethod.DELETE
        Default value is HttpMethod.GET
        Returns:

        "GET"

      • type

        public abstract java.lang.String type
        Constants are available with MediaType class.
        Returns:
        Default:

        Default:
